story: After joining forces with a veteran bounty hunter, sixteen-year-old fraternal twin sisters Sterling and Blair dive into the world of bail skipping baddies while still navigating the high stakes of teenage life.剧集主角是一对双胞胎姐妹Sterling及Blair Wesley（Maddie Phillips与Anjelica Bette Fellini饰演），她们伙拍资深赏金猎人Bowser Simmons（Kadeem Hardison饰）抓捕弃保潜逃的人，不过主角同时还得应付自己的青少年生活。Virginia Williams饰演的是Debbie Wesley。
